member.name: T:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter
member.summary: This class provides support for converting WordDocument into an PDF Document.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.Close
member.summary: Release the resources occupied by this instance.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the object.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.ConvertToPDF(Syncfusion.DocIO.DLS.WordDocument)
member.summary: Converts the specified WordDocument to PDF.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.ConvertToPDF(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the specified WordDocument to PDF.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.CreateWarningElmentNames
member.summary: Create warning element names into the list

member.name: P:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverter.IsCanceled
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this conversion has been canceled.
member.value: true if this conversion is canceled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings
member.summary: Represent class with setting of converter.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.m_enableAlternateChunks
member.summary: Need to enable the Alternate chunks element

member.name: F:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.m_imageQuality
member.summary: Indicates the quality of the image.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.ImageQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the quality. The value indicates in percentage, max value represents best quality and min value represents best compression.
member.remarks: The value indicates in percentage, max value represents best quality and min value represents best compression

member.name: P:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.ImageResolution
member.summary: Sets the image resolution to the image, which are Embedded in the Word document

member.name: P:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.OptimizeIdenticalImages
member.summary: Gets/Sets a value indicating whether to optimize the memory usage for the identical (duplicate) images in Doc to Pdf conversion and converted Pdf document.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.DocToPDFConverter.DocToPDFConverterSettings.Warning
member.summary: Gets or sets the warning that describes the unsupported elements found while converting the specified Word document to PDF.
